name: Remove Woocommerce Product Content
author: Geek Code Lab

sections.description:
By using this smart plugin, allows you to Hide product content from wooocommerce Single product page, Shop page and category page , no need to edit theme and woocommerce plugin!.

This Plugin integrates seamlessly with any WordPress Theme, and Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc.

Free Plugin Features

Here are some customizations you can make:

ðŸ‘‰ Single Product Page

ðŸ”¹ Remove Flash Sale
ðŸ”¹ Remove Product Price
ðŸ”¹ Remove Short Description
ðŸ”¹ Remove Categories
ðŸ”¹ Remove Add to Cart Button
ðŸ”¹ Remove Product Thumbnails
ðŸ”¹ Remove Related Product
ðŸ”¹ Remove Description Tab
ðŸ”¹ Remove Review Tab
ðŸ”¹ Remove Additional Information
ðŸ”¹ Remove All Product Tabs

ðŸ‘‰ Product List Page

ðŸ”¹ Hide Sale Flash
ðŸ”¹ Hide Rating
ðŸ”¹ Hide Add to Cart
ðŸ”¹ Hide Price
ðŸ”¹ Hide Sale Price
ðŸ”¹ Hide Variable Price

Any content from above you can easily hide and show easily from admin side.

This plugin provides a settings page where you can select your customize and save them without needing to write any code or modify any templates, which is helpful for quick change testing.

Note: This plugin may not work on the website which is made using builders like Elementor, Divi, etc. Because this plugin is based on woocommerce hooks and filters.

Pro Plugin Features

ðŸ”¹ Users can Hide product content individually.
ðŸ”¹ Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc by Category.
ðŸ”¹ Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc by individual product.
ðŸ”¹ User can hide product content by single product, category.

GET PRO PLUGIN

BUY NOW
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

After active plugin go to Woocommerce->Adding Content to the Footer.
